channel.title: Question on sprites (easyrsc/noobscape)
channel.description:
i was wondering how to make the login screen and the loading screen be blank without loading any new blank screens. and how to make the pentagram be replaced by the wood texture. and lastly, hownwould i make [i] all [/i] the demons share the same sprite set of dragons without editing anything outside graphically? but how to do it in noobscape/easyrsc.
thats the kind of thing im wondering.

item.title: Question on sprites (easyrsc/noobscape)
item.dc:creator: @Native_Method Native Method
item.description:
@Native_Method wrote:

Download the Sprite Editor / Packer from rscdump.com

Read full topic
